text: The Interliber - International Book and Teaching Appliances Fair () is the largest Croatian trade fair for books and teaching appliances. It is held annually in mid-November at the Zagreb Fair grounds in Zagreb, Croatia. Representatives from book publishing and multimedia companies from all over the world come to the Interliber in order to present their products to the general public. ==References== Category:Book fairs in Croatia Category:November events Category:Tourist attractions in Zagreb Category:Recurring events established in 1977 Category:Culture in Zagreb Category:1977 establishments in Yugoslavia Category:Autumn events in Croatia Category:Festivals in Yugoslavia
title: Interliber
